img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 31.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/04/Wukong_UpperHollow_31.jpg)
Continue up the long rounded path luring out the Puppet Spiders one at a time, and eventually you'll reach the far side of the large platform you saw across from the houses near the Upper Hollow Shrine.
img_below_text:
The Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine can be found here, along with a **Meditation Spot** in the middle of the pool.
The Carvings, Pool of Shattered Jade Meditation Spot

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character standing near a tranquil pool surrounded by lush vegetation and rocky terrain. The character appears to be approaching a glowing spot in the middle of the pool, which is likely the **Meditation Spot** mentioned in the following text. This location is identified as the Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine, a significant area in the game's Upper Hollow region. The preceding text describes the journey to this point, involving navigating a path and dealing with Puppet Spiders.
